trait.name: Keen Senses
text: The snow cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

trait.name: Stalker
text: If the snow cat surprises a creature and hits it with a bite attack, the target is grappled (escape DC 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
text: The snow cat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
